wu-tang clan: you no longer have to stand in front of me to feel my presence to reach out and touch me to offer not only words of support but a comforting hand live my experiences from one thousand miles away feel sand pour out of your hands on the beach in hawaii from a subway station in new york share my pain my joy my triumphs and failures you dont have to be there to be here the seven senses advanced cellular phone network will connect you in every way: verbally mentally spiritually and physically
